Hi Rahul,

> Hi
>
> I am looking for a crawler tool for copyright infringem=
ent purposes.  
> I believe Heritrix could solve that problem? I don=92t ha=
ve much  
> knowledge on web crawlers.
>
> I would like to get the crawler =
integrated with another hosted web  
> app. So that the confirmed result fr=
om the crawler are passed onto  
> the web app for display purposes (e.g. i=
f there are any urls which  
> are involved in infringement).
>

answer : y=
es, it could be possible , but need to do integration of  
application and =
heretrix modules also for this purpose.
>
>
>
> Also need an advice if I co=
uld do the following using Heritrix
>
> - specify start and end point of th=
e crawl
>
answer: it depend . if u are looking for hops , limited path,  
r=
esources etc . it is possible from heretrix
>
> - end point of the crawl ma=
y be defined after the crawl has been  
> initiated
>

yes possible , pleas=
e see above .
>
> - regular monitoring of pre-programmed sites
>
yes log fi=
les are displayed in webui
>
> - allow additional sites to be added on ad-h=
oc basis
>
yes its possible

>
> - collect global results
>

please explain=
 details for global results.  u get information about  
website , there res=
ources , amount of data and lot of other information
>
> - results matched =
to pre determined patterns both automatically and  
> manually
>
>
>

yes :=
 adaptive harvesting with some programming

> If I am unable to do any of t=
he above, could anyone advise of any  
> other web crawler, even if non-ope=
n source?
>

this is the best open source  crawler. u can go for Kapow tech=
nologies  
for solving ur problem, even IBM had good crawlers .
>
> Also, I=
 have quickly looked at the Heritrix website, I couldn=92t find  
> the typ=
e of database required?
>

u can connect to database. need to program. it h=
ad bdb frontier inside


thanks
ravinder

On Mar 18, 2009, at 6:01 PM, Rahi=
l Baig wrote:

>
> Hi
>
> I am looking for a crawler tool for copyright inf=
ringement purposes.

=92t have much

>

rawler integrated with another hosted web  
> app. So that the confirmed re=
sult from the crawler are passed onto  
> the web app for display purposes =
(e.g. if there are any urls which  
> are involved in infringement).
>
>
>
=
> Also need an advice if I could do the following using Heritrix
>
> - spec=
ify start and end point of the crawl
>
> - end point of the crawl may be de=
fined after the crawl has been  
> initiated
>
> - regular monitoring of pr=
e-programmed sites
>
> - allow additional sites to be added on ad-hoc basis=

>
> - collect global results
>
> - results matched to pre determined patte=
rns both automatically and  
> manually
>
>
>
> If I am unable to do any of=
 the above, could anyone advise of any  
> other web crawler, even if non-o=
pen source?
>
> Also, I have quickly looked at the Heritrix website, I coul=
dn=92t find  
> the type of database required?
>
>
>
> Many thanks
>
> Rahi=
l
>
>
>
